job.title: Software Engineer - Front End UI
job.description:
Software Engineer Front End / UI

You

An experienced Full Stack Developer with a passion for UI.

Responsibilities & Goals
  • Own features to create widgets and a hosted UI environment for client financial institutions to provide bill pay to their customers, with minimal oversight
  • Have a deep understanding of the systems: Know the end-to-end processing of a payment presented to the system (component flow), the DTO model, the API and the details of the widgets and web service
  • Deliver on-quality, on-time features and tasks assigned, and produce platform live with 1-2 customers by end of year
  • Provide insight into our customers


Requirements
  • 5+ years of software development experience
  • ‘Full Stack’ developer with emphasis on web services and UI
  • Experience with responsive web apps and mobile development
  • Experience with Javascript tech (React JS)
  • Experience with Cloud Environment (AWS)
  • Experience with DevOps and configuring build environment
  • High tolerance for ambiguity
  • Thrives in a fast paced work environment
  • Seeks to understand the whole of how things work beyond their functional area
  • Stoked by solving customer issues
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Self-starter with the ability to own broad feature areas independently
  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related major with strong academic record
  • Willingness to work in a highly collaborative environment where the belief is that great ideas can come from anywhere


Recommended But Not Required
  • Experience in payments industry
  • Experience with our tooling/tech stack
  • Experience in small company environment
  • Client facing work
